item.title: Japanese city to name and shame people who break rubbish rules
item.description: Fukushima plans to go through trash that is not properly sorted, and publicly identify offenders.

item.title: Here's what you need to know about the Pelicot trial
item.description: Judges have delivered verdicts on the defendants in a case that turned a 72-year-old woman into a feminist icon.

item.title: Macron lands in cyclone-hit Mayotte bringing food and health aid
item.description: Rescuers race to find missing people and survivors in the French territory devastated by Cyclone Chido.

item.title: Two missing and 13 dead after navy speedboat hits ferry off Mumbai
item.description: Three navy personnel are among the dead, while more than 100 people have been rescued, an official said.

item.title: At least 100 North Koreans dead in Ukraine war, says South
item.description: Some 1,000 have been injured and senior officers are among the casualties, an MP says, quoting officials.
